attributes.action: To urgently meet with the General Secretary’s of the Public Sector Trade Unions in relation to their pay claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Inflation is running at 4.3% and earnings across the economy are rising by 3.6% but the local government employers have offered 2% pay rise. This is in line with the government's 2% public sector pay policy. It's a pay cut, not a pay rise! Public sector workers deserve better.
